name: No Art.
description:
GDKO Round 3

This round we had to create a game with no real game art. I decided to have minimalistic shapes with text faces as a substitute to real art.

Description.

Drag the characters onto the placement mats in order to get through each stage. Get all characters onto the button and you will have completed the level!

How to Play.
  • Mouse - Drag and drop characters + Select options
